title: Sickles
content:
Sickles in Baldur's Gate 3 are a piece of equipment that is used to inflict damage against hostile characters such as Enemies and Bosses. Sickles are a Light Simple Weapons in BG3 that can be one-handed, dealing 1-4 Damage without enchantments. They have a range of 1.5m, and they deal Slashing Damage, though some special Sickles also deal another type of Damage as well.

Many Sickles have unique properties, so you should read carefully what these do, and many also have Weapon Actions that can only be used if you are Proficient with Sickles in BG3. This Weapon Action is Lacerate.
